title: New: Rubee Rayne – Breathe
body:
While **Rubee Rayne**‘s look is undoubtably edgy, her music is quite the opposite.

_Breathe_ is filled with breathy (no pun intended), soft, soulful vocals. The track itself is warm, and it’s catchy synth melody is exactly why we’ve had it on repeat for 24 hours. _This_ is the kind of R&B that leaves you feeling the perfect amount of sexy, and you can get it for free below.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/125086574″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
